entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
